sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of V-Blender for dry mixing of powders.
sections.scope: Applicable to blending activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Inspect the V-shell interior for cleanliness and dryness.
Check the discharge valve for proper closure and seal.
Load ingredients through the charging ports (up to 50-60% volume).
Secure the charging lids and engage safety interlocks.
Set the blending speed and timer as per the protocol.
Start the rotation and monitor for smooth operation.
After the cycle, stop the blender in the vertical discharge position.
Open the discharge valve and collect the blend.
Clean the interior thoroughly, focusing on the apex and valve area.
Document the blending parameters and yield.
precautions: Do not overload the blender beyond its effective mixing capacity.
Ensure the safety cage or interlock is functional before starting.
Maintain proper speed to avoid centrifugal segregation.
Clean between products to prevent cross-contamination.
Wear appropriate dust protection during loading and unloading.
